overview: From the first seconds you will be awaiting - your way is long and dangerous.. What's going to be up there? You are surrounded by woods and stones. Your feet hurt. Your back is falling apart, but you are not alone - there are strong, mighty people by your side. Someone will give you water, some will pat your back: they will give you some food. You are not alone, but your people are sick, tired and dying..
title: Backbone of the Urals
